author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Luxury suites booking site, Suiteness, picks DHISCO to power its expansion - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Luxury suites booking site, Suiteness, picks DHISCO to power its expansion Published on : Tuesday, September 1, 2015
DHISCO, the world’s leading hospitality distribution company, is partnering with the new booking site Suiteness as it expands beyond Las Vegas to connect travelers with some of the world’s finest hotel suites.
Based in Oakland, California, Suiteness.com launched this summer, offering consumers access to Las Vegas hotel suites that previously were unavailable to the public.
“Our partnership with Suiteness underscores our commitment to working with start-ups around the world to bring their visions for new hotel booking products to life,” said Toni Portmann, DHISCO CEO.
“Suiteness, like many of the new companies we are working with, is using original technology to help consumers search for rooms in new ways and enjoy previously unavailable experiences. Our mission is to support all of these companies and connect them with hotels around the globe.”
Suiteness’ booking site is dedicated to suites and designed to help travelers find luxury rooms that provide unique experiences.
“We are pleased to be partnering with DHISCO, a world leader in distribution technology,” said Robbie Bhathal, Suiteness co-founder and CEO. “To be successful, we need the fastest, most reliable, affordable connections available. DHISCO provides everything we need to keep growing and taking care of our customers optimally.”
Suiteness currently offers more than 5,000 suites at 15 Las Vegas hotels, including Caesar’s Entertainment, among others. It plans to add luxury suites in several additional cities before the end of 2015.
